name: Rtillery
description:
Rtillery is an isometric tank shooter with a low-poly art style. Shoot your way through endless waves of enemies to earn cash. Use this cash to buy new tanks and decals to customise them with. Complete achievements to unlock more tanks, decals and paint jobs.

Choose from 9 tanks with different weapons and play styles and then customise them with one of the 7 paint jobs and 20 decals. Choose from 6 battlefields, varying from deserts and swamps, to missile launch sites and junkyards. Select from two game-modes, deathmatch and timed-hunt, before charging into battle.

See how long you can last.

Good luck soldier!

Features:

- Unlock and play as 9 different tanks

- Customise your tank with 21 decals and 7 camos

- Play in 6 unique arenas

- Choose from two game modes, each with their own challenges and mechanics

- Collect power-ups to gain an advantage over the enemy

- Defeat bosses to gain point bonuses

- Complete 19 achievements all with their own rewards

Please leave any questions, feedback or suggestions in the comments below.
